summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1308, for the improvement of Fifteenth Avenue, from East Cherry Street to East Madison Street all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and other appurtenances thereon, under Ordinance No. 14750 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
